params._finder: the finder contract used to look up addresses.
params._governor: the governor contract that this contract makes proposals to.
params._token: the ERC20 token that the bond is paid in.

getCurrentTime().details: Can be overridden to control contract time.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.ancillaryData: arbitrary data appended to a price request to give the voters more info from the caller.
params.transactions: list of transactions for the governor to execute.

returns._0: id the id of the governor proposal.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resolveProposal(uint256).details: For the resolution to work correctly, this contract must be a registered contract in the DVM.

setBond(uint256).details: Admin is intended to be the governance system itself.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Proposer contract that allows anyone to make governance proposals with a bond.

propose((address,uint256,bytes)[],bytes).notice: Propose a new set of governance transactions for vote.

resolveProposal(uint256).notice: Resolves a proposal by checking the status of the request in the Voting contract.

setBond(uint256).notice: Admin method to set the bond amount.
